moduleName: Google Sheets / Values / Batch Clear By Filter
description: Clears one or more ranges of values from a spreadsheet. The caller must specify the spreadsheet ID and one or more DataFilters. Ranges matching any of the specified data filters will be cleared. Only values are cleared -- all other properties of the cell (such as formatting, data validation, etc..) are kept.

schema.description: OAuth 2 access token. Most APIs require `https://www.googleapis.com/auth/spreadsheets` scope. Google Auth / Service Account Token can be used to obtain a valid access token.
API key can be generated in Google Developer Console in APIs & Services section. Leave blank if OAuth access token is used.
The ID of the spreadsheet to update.
The DataFilters used to determine which ranges to clear.
